text: peṇkaḷai nīṅkaḷ tīṇṭuvataṟku muṉ, allatu avarkaḷuṭaiya maharai niccayam ceyvataṟku muṉ, talāk coṉṉāl uṅkaḷ mītu kuṟṟamillai. Āyiṉum avarkaḷukkup palaṉuḷḷa poruḷkaḷaik koṭu(ttu utavu)ṅkaḷ - atāvatu celvam paṭaittavaṉ avaṉukkut takka aḷavum, ēḻai avaṉukkut takka aḷavum koṭuttu, niyāyamāṉa muṟaiyil utavi ceytal vēṇṭum; itu nallōr mītu kaṭamaiyākum
